node.title: Peloton's stocks plummeted after And Just Like That premiered. Now the company has responded
node.alt: Actor Chris Noth lounges on a couch with christmas lights behind
node.description: Share prices in workout equipment company Peloton nose-dived after one of their products appearedÂ in Sex and the City reboot And Just Like that. *WARNING: SPOILERS*
node.content:
["Share prices in workout equipment company Peloton nose-dived after one of their products appeared\u00a0in Sex and the City reboot And Just Like that \u2014 and not in a nice, happy scene, either.", "*If you don't want spoilers, now would be the time to stop reading*", "One of the company's exercise bikes appeared in a scene of HBO's\u00a0reboot\u00a0that involved the death of fan favourite Mr Big, and fans were quick to link the\u00a0fictional death with the very much non-fictional brand.", "But in a video, Peloton attempted to turn the situation around with a cameo from Mr Big himself (aka actor Chris Noth), an appearance from real-life\u00a0Peloton instructor Jess King, and a voice-over by Ryan Reynolds.", "", "
File this photo under Images Taken Seconds Before Heartbreak.(HBO Max:\u00a0Craig Blankenhorn)
", "
How did Peloton respond?
", "To set the scene, we've got a fireplace surrounded by Christmas decorations, candles, dim lighting, the works.", "\"You look great,\" King says to Noth while the pair sit on a couch in front of a fireplace, to which he replies: \"I feel great\".", "\"Should we take another ride? Life's too short not to,\" he says, gesturing to \u2014 you guessed it \u2014 two Peloton exercise bikes.", "And cue Ryan Reynolds's voice-over:", "
I'm lost \u2014 what's all this about?
", "*THIS IS THE BIT WITH THE BIGGEST SPOILERS \u2014 DON'T SAY WE DIDN'T WARN YOU*", "In the highly-anticipated reboot of Sex and the City, titled And Just Like That, Mr Big (played by Chris Noth) has a heart attack and dies after working out on\u00a0a Peloton exercise bike.", "The scene left fans rattled, with Mr Big having been a regular character on the show since it first began in the late 1990s.", "A Peloton spokesperson told BuzzFeed News that the company had approved an appearance on the show by instructor Jess King, who plays Mr Big's favourite trainer Allegra, but it wasn't aware of the plot before the show aired.", "\"Due to confidentiality reasons, HBO did not disclose the larger context surrounding the scene to Peloton in advance,\" Peloton's\u00a0Denise Kelly told BuzzFeed.", "It's also understood Peloton didn't provide the bike that killed Mr Big for use on the show.", "
What happened after the show aired?
", "Peloton's stock price absolutely plummeted.", "The company went into damage control, releasing statements about how bike riding actually improves cardiovascular fitness and blaming Mr Big's \"extravagant lifestyle\" for his heart attack.", "Notwithstanding the sharp decline after the death episode aired, its stocks had been generally falling for some time now.", "Companies like Peloton and Zoom have been some of the hardest hit on the stock market as COVID lockdowns end and people start to go back to the office and the gym.", "SoulCycle, one of Peloton's biggest competitors, couldn't help but have a little fun with the situation though:", "
Could this be taken further?
", "Intellectual property and entertainment lawyer Nancy Prager told the New York Times that production companies can use a product with a trademark on it if that product is used in a way that's consistent with the original trademark, but the principle doesn't apply when it's used \"in a way that disparages the mark or the brand\".\u00a0", "She says because Peloton wasn't aware of the script beforehand, and because its stock prices took a substantial dive, there could potentially be grounds for legal action against HBO.", "", "
A Peloton spokesperson flagged Mr Big's \"extravagant\"\u00a0lifestyle of \"cocktails, cigars, and big steaks\"\u00a0as a potential factor in his heart attack.(HBO:\u00a0Craig Blankenhorn)
", "But Peloton's main response so far has been the brief video closing with \"he's alive\" \u2014 so it may be the case that they just leave it at that."]
